sentences.en: Any place you can crawl up to a bunker without being seen?
sentences.cn: 你能否有地方可以爬到掩体不被看见?

sentences.en: Dogleg left, request good approaching shot, water and bunker at the right.
sentences.cn: 左狗腿, 主要在于攻果岭的那一杆, 右边又沙又水.

sentences.en: Frost holed a bunker shot from 50 feet to snatch the title by one stroke.
sentences.cn: 弗罗斯特在50英尺外的沙坑中击球入穴，以一杆的优势获得冠军。

sentences.en: He put his second shot in a bunker to the left of the green.
sentences.cn: 他把第二杆球打进了草地左边的沙坑。

sentences.en: I play normal bunker shots with an open stance.
sentences.cn: 我打一般的沙坑球采取开立击球姿势。

sentences.en: In the electric light of bunker much remained to be done.
sentences.cn: 在地下避弹室的灯光下,还有许多事情要做.

sentences.en: In the electric light of the bunker much remained to be done.
sentences.cn: 在地下避弹室的电灯光下,还有许多事情要做.

sentences.en: Index 13, there is a bunker in the middle of the fairway.
sentences.cn: 难度13, 大堂正中有个大沙池等着你.

sentences.en: Inevitably, a sort of bunker mentality quickly set in.
sentences.cn: 一种背水一战的心态不可避免地很快产生了.

sentences.en: Oh no! I just hit my ball into a bunker!
sentences.cn: 惨了! 我刚把球打到沙坑里了!

sentences.en: On April 26 he quietly left the bunker.
sentences.cn: 4月26日那天,他悄悄地离开了地下避弹室.

sentences.en: Order all command posts to puII back north of the tunneI bunker.
sentences.cn: 命令所有的指挥部转移到北面的地堡里去.

sentences.en: Please notice that the bunker surcharge will be down regulated to 10.75.
sentences.cn: 下个月燃油附加费将下调到10.75,请知悉!

sentences.en: Please pay attention to the bunker on the left of the water.
The ball rolled across the green and into the bunker.
sentences.cn: 球滚过草地,然后进入沙洞.

sentences.en: This leads to the maintenance tunnel underneath the command bunker.
sentences.cn: 这个会带领我们到司令部下面的养护地道.

words.tran_cn: 使陷入困境；把球击入沙坑

trans.tran_en: a large hole on a golf course filled with sand

trans.tran_cn: 把（煤等）堆入舱内，使陷入困境，把球击入沙坑
trans.tran_en: to hit a golf ball into a bunker
